name: EventFilterer
description: A fundamental interface in JSMacros that provides sophisticated event filtering capabilities to control which events trigger listeners.
overview: Event filters are essential when working with frequently triggered events like packet events or block updates. Instead of processing every single event, you can specify conditions that must be met before your script logic executes.

methods.name: canFilter
methods.description: Returns whether this filterer can handle the specified event type.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Tests whether an event passes the filter criteria.

name: FiltererSendPacket
description: Filters outgoing packet events based on packet type.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Set the packet type to filter.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Packet name or null for all packets

name: FiltererRecvPacket
description: Filters incoming packet events based on packet type.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Set the packet type to filter.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Packet name or null for all packets

name: FiltererBlockUpdate
description: Filters block update events based on position, block type, update type, and block states.

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Set a single position to filter using coordinates.

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Set a single position to filter using a BlockPosHelper object.

methods.name: setArea
methods.signature: setArea(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
methods.description: Set a cubic area to filter using coordinates.

methods.name: setArea
methods.description: Set a cubic area to filter using BlockPosHelper objects.

methods.name: setBlockId
methods.description: Set the block ID to filter.

methods.name: setUpdateType
methods.description: Set the update type to filter.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Map of property names to values

methods.name: setBlockState
methods.description: Set a single block state property.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Property value, or null to ensure property is absent

name: FiltererModulus
description: Process only every nth event to reduce lag with high-frequency events.

methods.name: setQuotient
methods.description: Change the divisor used to determine how often events are processed.

parameters.name: quotient
parameters.description: New divisor value (will be converted to positive)

name: ComposedEventFilterer
description: Allows combining multiple filters using AND/OR logic.

methods.name: and
methods.description: Adds a filter using logical AND (all conditions must be true).

methods.name: or
methods.description: Adds a filter using logical OR (any condition can be true).
